sentences.sContent: The mania for dinosaurs began in the late 1800s.
sentences.sCn: 恐龙热兴起于19世纪晚期。

remMethod.val: man(狂热) + ia(表病， 名词后缀) → 躁狂； 狂热

trans.tranCn: [医]颠狂, 狂躁, 癖好, 狂热
trans.tranOther: a strong desire for something or interest in something, especially one that affects a lot of people at the same time
